Sometimes you want things to be old, like cheese, wine or the presenter of Question Time. I hope that everyone at the BBC gets the message. I would rather see Selina Scott and Joanna Lumley on my TV screens than Holly Willoughby and Fearne Cotton . Selina Scott , now 59, settled an age discrimination case against Channel 5 two years ago for a reported? 250,000. Holly Willoughby , 29, presents ITV's Dancing on Ice with Phillip Schofield .
